definition: to appraise/to pass judgment on/to speak ill of/praise and censure/appraisal
to praise/to commend/to honor/(of clothes) large or loose
to diminish/to demote/to reduce or devaluate/to disparage/to censure/to depreciate
dispensing praise or blame with a single word (idiom)/concise and powerful style

sentences.english: People pass different judgements on him.
The press has different attitudes towards cooperation between the world's two major automobile manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 輿論界對世界兩大汽車製造商的合作褒貶不一。

sentences.english: Worker reaction to the terms was mixed.
sentences.chinese: 工人們對協議條款褒貶不一。

sentences.english: An approach to fuzzy query expansion based on synonymy thesaurus;
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了利用同義詞詞林來計算詞彙褒貶的方法。

sentences.english: Different Judgments in the parties is difficult to judge in Linggang fighters or clowns ?
sentences.chinese: 各方褒貶不一難評判於凌罡是鬥士還是小丑？

sentences.english: An improved steganographic algorithm based on synonymy substitution for chinese text;
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了利用同義詞詞林來計算詞彙褒貶的方法。

sentences.english: U.S. lawmakers have given President Obama's new Afghan strategy mixed reviews.
sentences.chinese: 美國議員對奧巴馬總統的阿富汗新戰略褒貶不一。

sentences.english: This paper proposes a new method to analyze word semantic orientation based on Chinese Thesaurus -Tongyici Cilin.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了利用同義詞詞林來計算詞彙褒貶的方法。

sentences.english: But it has drawn a mixed response from the transgender community itself.
sentences.chinese: 但來自變性人羣體自身的反應則褒貶不一。

sentences.english: The objective conditions, such as the honor, shame, praise and disparagement, have no influence on him.
sentences.chinese: 客觀條件的榮辱與褒貶等都不能影響他。

definition: to add parallels and interpretations (to a story etc)/to develop and embellish/to interpret (often in a strained manner)
style of study/academic atmosphere/school discipline/school traditions
to elucidate/to expound/to study and explain
to act in a way that defeats one's purpose (idiom)
different routes to the same destination (idiom); fig. different means of achieve the same end
